Simplified Local Growth is about building a local business that can be around for decades, it will give you not just freedom from the stress of finding new customers, but you'll also have the opportunity to sell the business because of what you built.Who is this for?This is for 2 types of people. People in charge of marketing for a local business to help you streamline your work. It is also for local business owners who would like to accelerate their phone calls and walk-ins (and put them on autopilot), and also free up some of their time by automating and delegating some of the work.How is this different than all the other stuff out there?Generally all the other

the other stuff out there?Generally all the other stuff out there teaches people how to do a general setup. We go into a lot of detail so that you can understand and make any kind of adjustments down the road if you need.Do you offer more in depth help?Yes.
